Dear Dave,
I'm sending the 25.00 Monday AM for the LaPorte card first thing.
Would you hold the Leach card until the end of the week and I'll send you the 35.00 for it on this coming Friday?
I'll definitely buy it, just can not mail the 35.00 until this Friday. 
LMK, and consider the card sold if you can hold it 4 days.
Regards,
Bill Hedin
